result.execSummary:
The defendant Peruta Nmi Minic was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Peruta Nmi Minic is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Peruta Nmi Minic was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Inclusive of costs.
Apply bond on file.

Apply bond on file.
DNA surcharge.
Defendant to provide a DNA sample at the Jail.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Rohan. ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Angela Raye Olson   DF:  Peruta Nmi Minic appeared. Case called at 8:42 am. A resolution has been reached. State recites agreement. DE pleads G to Ct 3 in 15CM342. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 3 in 15CM342. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1 and Ct 2  in 15CM342. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:
F/F $1,000 inclusive ($557 fine, $243 costs, $200 DNA surcharge)
DNA sample to be submitted to jail
Balance of money on file refunded to payor

Final pre-trial at 01-15-2015 08:30 am.
Jury trial at 02-04-2016 08:30 am.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA: Alexis McKinley  DF ATTY:  Angela Raye Olson   DF:  Peruta Nmi Minic appeared. Case called at 8:49 a.m. Parties are requesting to be set for trial. All pre trial motions, verdicts, jury forms to be filed no later than 01-08-2016. Address confirmed. Bond continues  Jury trial scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Filed by Atty Olson. Requesting a continuance of 10/16/2015. Hearing rescheduled. km

for Attorney to Appear and Act. Signed by Def. km

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Angela Raye Olson   DF:  Peruta Nmi Minic appeared. Case called at 8:22 a.m. ADA McKinley states this needs to be set for another PTC.  Atty Olson requested discovery and was never sent out. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference at 09-09-2015 08:15 am

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Garret F. or Kylan O.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: RMW, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley & Megan Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Angela Raye Olson,  DF:  Peruta Nmi Minic appeared. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Initial appearance on August 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
